set_output.name: Set Output
set_output.description: Set the value of an output on the controller e.g. setting the lights to AUTO (Automatic) instead of using the switch entity in HA (which only supports OFF/ON).

did.name: Device ID
did.description: Device ID of selected output, can be obtained from attributes of the given switch in HA.

setting.name: Setting
setting.description: Target setting for the output, one of: ON/OFF/AUTO
